description: Represents an algorithm, method or technique applied in a problem, like, binary search, two-pointer technique, etc.
title: Method

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Set of key/value pairs that may additionally augment the data model.

description.title: Description
description.description: Contains relevant information about a method possibly with curated list of external references.

data_structure.title: Data Structure
data_structure.description: Link to a principal (default) data structure required by a method. For example, Kruskal's algorithm assumes the usage of the  disjoint-set (union find) data structure.
